metro.GameScreen

Class GameScreen.SettingsWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen.SettingsWindow
  • Enclosing class:
    GameScreen

    public class GameScreen.SettingsWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the settings window, that provides some options to configure.
    Author:
    hauke
